topic-acknowledgements-ack_i18n.name: Internationalization Acknowledgements
topic-acknowledgements-ack_i18n.summary: Balthisar Tidy wants to be a good, global citizen. In this article you can learn who has helped provide translations for Tidy, and learn what you can do to help.

topic-acknowledgements-ack_opensource.name: Open Source Software Acknowledgements
topic-acknowledgements-ack_opensource.summary: Discover who else’s efforts contributed to Balthisar Tidy.

topic-acknowledgements-license.name: Source Code License and Contributor Agreement
topic-acknowledgements-license.summary: Balthisar Tidy is open source, and you can help its development, too. Have a look at the license and contributor agreement if you’re interested in lending a hand.

topic-advanced-applescript.name: Control Balthisar Tidy using AppleScript
topic-advanced-applescript.summary: Learn how AppleScript can be used to automate Balthisar Tidy. If you have dozens, hundreds, or thousands of files to process, then AppleScript can handle the job.

topic-advanced-export_config.name: Use Your Tidy Options with Command Line Tidy
topic-advanced-export_config.summary: Balthisar Tidy makes it easy to use its settings with the traditional command line Tidy.

topic-advanced-extension.name: Use Tidy as an Action Extension
topic-advanced-extension.summary: Learn how to use the power of Balthisar Tidy in virtually every standard, up to date Mac application.

topic-advanced-service.name: Use Balthisar Tidy as a System Service
topic-advanced-service.summary: Learn how to use the power of Balthisar Tidy in virtually every standard Mac application.

topic-advanced-use_exportrtf.name: Export Rich Text Files (RTF)
topic-advanced-use_exportrtf.summary: Exporting Tidy’d text into RTF gives you the ability to easily use Balthisar Tidy for Work’s output in many different environments.

topic-advanced-use_nu_server.name: Use the Nu Validator Outside of Balthisar Tidy
topic-advanced-use_nu_server.summary: ’s built-in validator service can be used to perform HTML document validation from a browser or Terminal scripts.

topic-advanced-use_themes.name: Customize your Environment using Schemes
topic-advanced-use_themes.summary: This feature enables the use of custom colors within Balthisar Tidy for Work, including a full-fledged themes editor.

topic-advanced-use_tidylib.name: Use a different version of LibTidy
topic-advanced-use_tidylib.summary: This feature allows Balthisar Tidy to use the Tidy engine from the HTML Tidy project.

topic-docu-docu-fullscreen.name: Full Screen Mode
topic-docu-docu-fullscreen.summary: Learn about the features and differences of using Balthisar Tidy in full screen mode.

topic-docu-docu-messages.name: The Tidy Messages Table
topic-docu-docu-messages.summary: The Tidy Messages table is the primary means of communicating to you the changes that Balthisar Tidy wants to make to your document.

topic-docu-docu-options.name: Tidy Options
topic-docu-docu-options.summary: A plethora of Tidy options gives you full control over the output style, error corrections, and problem detection that Balthisar Tidy offers you.

topic-docu-docu-preview.name: The Browser Preview Panel
topic-docu-docu-preview.summary: The Browser Preview panel can provide immediate feedback on how well your page renders in a web browser.

topic-docu-docu-source-source.name: The Source HTML Area
topic-docu-docu-source-source.summary: The Source HTML area is where you can view and modify the original HTML document.

topic-docu-docu-source-tidyd.name: The Tidy HTML Area
topic-docu-docu-source-tidyd.summary: The Tidy HTML area contains the proposed, Tidy’d document.

topic-docu-docu-sourcearea.name: The Source Code Area
topic-docu-docu-sourcearea.summary: The Source code area contains the original, Source HTML document and the proposed, Tidy’d document. It’s flexible and adaptable to your needs.

topic-docu-docu-splitters.name: Splitters
topic-docu-docu-splitters.summary: The splitters are not obvious, but knowledge about them will make your use of Balthisar Tidy a lot easier.

topic-docu-docu-tabbed.name: Using Tabbed Windows
topic-docu-docu-tabbed.summary: Learn about using Balthisar Tidy with tabbed document windows.

topic-docu-docu-toolbar.name: The Toolbar
topic-docu-docu-toolbar.summary: This comprehensive toolbar reference will help you dominate your complete workflow.

topic-docu-docu-validator.name: The W3C Validator Table
topic-docu-docu-validator.summary: The Tidy Messages table is the primary means of communicating to you the changes that Balthisar Tidy wants to make to your document.

topic-en.lproj-overview.name: What is Balthisar Tidy?
topic-en.lproj-overview.summary: Why do I want to use Balthisar Tidy anyway?

topic-en.lproj-start_using.name: Start Using Balthisar Tidy
topic-en.lproj-start_using.summary: These two tasks will have you using Balthisar Tidy in no time. You will learn about starting Balthisar Tidy the first time, and then you will “Tidy” a document.

topic-en.lproj-support.name: Support and Bug Reports
topic-en.lproj-support.summary: balthisar.com wants you to be a happy user and so if you have questions, bug reports, feature suggestions, etc., then we want to hear from you!

topic-how_doc-doc-create.name: Create a New Document
topic-how_doc-doc-create.summary: This quick lesson will demonstrate how to start with a blank, empty document that you can use to quickly generate a structure for valid HTML.

topic-how_doc-doc-encoding.name: Use the File Encoding Helper
topic-how_doc-doc-encoding.summary: You may be surprised by the file encoding helper. You won’t be afraid of it after reviewing this quick lesson.

topic-how_doc-doc-open.name: Open a Document

topic-how_doc-doc-save.name: Save a Tidy’d Document
topic-how_doc-doc-save.summary: Avoid surprises when saving your Tidy’d file by having a look at this lesson.

topic-how_doc-doc-tidy.name: Tidy an Existing Document
topic-how_doc-doc-tidy.summary: This quick demonstration shows you how easy it is to Tidy an existing document.

topic-how_doc-doc-view_edit.name: View and Edit HTML Source Text
topic-how_doc-doc-view_edit.summary: Learn the basics of viewing and editing the Source HTML in this lesson.

topic-how_doc-doc-view_tidyd.name: View Tidy’d Text
topic-how_doc-doc-view_tidyd.summary: This lesson demonstrates how to view the “Tidy’d” text that Balthisar Tidy makes for you.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-chooseoptions.name: Choose Tidy Options
topic-how_docwin-docwin-chooseoptions.summary: There are hundreds of different ways to fix and Tidy your files. Learn to choose among the options here.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-editormessages.name: Work with Messages in the Source Area
topic-how_docwin-docwin-editormessages.summary: Work with Tidy Messages directly in the source code editing area.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-fullscreen.name: Use Balthisar Tidy in Full Screen Mode
topic-how_docwin-docwin-fullscreen.summary: Ignore your distractions by working in full screen mode.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-hidefeedbackarea.name: Hide the Feedback Panel
topic-how_docwin-docwin-hidefeedbackarea.summary: When you need more room to work, hiding the Feedback Panel may be a good option.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-hidetidyoptions.name: Hide the Tidy Options
topic-how_docwin-docwin-hidetidyoptions.summary: When you’re happy with your selection of Tidy options, you may find that they get in your way. Learn how to hide them in this article.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-messages.name: View and Use the Tidy Messages Table
topic-how_docwin-docwin-messages.summary: The Tidy Messages table is essential to understanding the changes that Tidy made to your document, and why.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-orientation.name: Change the Source Area Orientation
topic-how_docwin-docwin-orientation.summary: Explore your source code layout options in this brief lesson.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-preview.name: See how your page displays using the Browser Preview
topic-how_docwin-docwin-preview.summary: The Browser Preview panel will give you confidence that Tidy isn’t making changes that break your web page.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-quicktutorial.name: Show the Quick Tutorial
topic-how_docwin-docwin-quicktutorial.summary: Learn to view an on-screen guide to the major elements of a Balthisar Tidy document window.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-splitter.name: Use the Window Splitter Controls
topic-how_docwin-docwin-splitter.summary: Learn to gain control over the size of the document window elements.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-syntaxhighlighti.name: Work with Syntax Highlighting
topic-how_docwin-docwin-syntaxhighlighti.summary: Learn how syntax highlighting can make it even easier to work with Balthisar Tidy.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-toolbarcustomize.name: Customize, Hide, or Show the Toolbar
topic-how_docwin-docwin-toolbarcustomize.summary: Like all good Mac applications, Balthisar Tidy has a full-featured toolbar to aid your productivity.

topic-how_docwin-docwin-validator.name: Validate Your Document with the W3C Validator
topic-how_docwin-docwin-validator.summary: The W3C Validator gives you the peace of mind that your Tidy’d document meets all of the W3C specifications for HTML.

topic-how_options-options-appearance.name: Change the Appearance of Tidy Options
topic-how_options-options-appearance.summary: In this lesson you will learn how to change the appearance of the Tidy options, such as friendly names, row highlighting, and hover behavior.

topic-how_options-options-descriptions.name: Find Descriptions for Tidy Options
topic-how_options-options-descriptions.summary: Learn to understand the purpose and meaning of each Tidy option.

topic-how_options-options-export.name: Export Tidy Options for Command Line Use
topic-how_options-options-export.summary: You’ve finally perfected the options in order to get the output you want. Now learn to use these options with the Terminal (command line) version of Tidy.

topic-how_options-options-group.name: Change the Grouping of Tidy Options
topic-how_options-options-group.summary: This lesson shows you how to turn Tidy option grouping on and off.

topic-how_options-options-import.name: Import Tidy Options from a Configuration File
topic-how_options-options-import.summary: If you’re already a user of command line Tidy, then have no fear; Balthisar Tidy for Work lets you use your existing Tidy configuration files.

topic-how_options-options-makedefault.name: Make the Current Tidy Options Default
topic-how_options-options-makedefault.summary: Now that your Tidy options are perfect, follow this lesson to turn them into default settings for all future documents.

topic-how_options-options-revertbuiltin.summary: Balthisar Tidy comes with factory settings for its Tidy options. This lesson teaches you how to revert to these settings easily.

topic-how_options-options-revertdefault.name: Revert Tidy Options to Default
topic-how_options-options-revertdefault.summary: Balthisar Tidy makes it easy to experiment with different settings, but if you’ve gone too far, you can easily revert to the default settings.
